title: Prince Harry’s Legal Case: Tabloids May Have Hacked My Mom Princess Diana, and Covered It Up
text:
If you love The Daily Beast’s royal coverage, then we hope you’ll enjoy The Royalist, a members-only series for Beast Inside. Become a member to get it in your inbox on Sunday.

Did the tabs hack Princess Diana?

Prince Harry’s dramatic declaration of war on the press came in two parts this week; his explosive and emotional statement that his wife was taking the Mail on Sunday to court for infringing her copyright was made on Tuesday, and then a second front was opened on Friday with the revelation that he was launching legal action against the Sun and the Mirror for phone hacking.
description: New details on Harry’s legal bombshell, Thomas Markle defends himself for releasing Meghan’s letter, Andrew keeps digging on Epstein, and Meghan’s simple African tour wardrobe.
